text:
Hi <@UAYBXDG4U> I have a question regarding <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions|HubL functions> in JS modules / partials.
I have to add a CTA to a module via CtaField, and load it in the module via fieldValues.

What's the best way to do so without duplicating JS scripts from the embed UI on HubSpot?
I want to avoid duplicating unnecessary code, but I don't know if I can use HubL functions in JS modules.

Last question, I promise :sweat_smile:

Are there any logs on the HubSpot projects side?
So if I console.log() something on the server for example, I see it there.

Or if I get an error in production, I can debug it.

Error handling / debug tools would be greatly appreciated!

Regarding menus, I've answered my own question. Using the menu() HubL function on the theme side passed as hublParameters in the JS module. I will use this method for other data as well :slightly_smiling_face:
